featured.text: When a person died, his or her soul was thought to travel to an underworld, where it 17 a series of judgments before it could progress to a better life in the next world.

definition.zh_def: 地獄或陰間，通常指死後靈魂的居所或隱秘的社會。
definition.en_def: The world of the dead or a hidden society, often associated with evil or crime.
definition.example: In mythology, the hero descended into the underworld to retrieve his lost love.
